text: ཀུན་མཁྱེན་དོལ་པོ་པ་ཤེས་རབ་རྒྱལ་མཚན་གྱི་གསུང་འབུམ། Works of Dolpopa 篤補巴·喜饒堅贊大師全集
zh-TW: 篤補巴·喜饒堅贊大師全集
zh-CN: 笃补巴·喜饶坚赞大师全集

nodes.en: Volume 1, ༼ཀ༽
ri chos nges don rgya mtsho'i sa bcad bzhugs/
ri chos nges don rgya mtsho zhes bya ba mthar thug thun mong ma yin pa'i man ngag bzhugs/
Volume 2, ༼ཁ༽
theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos legs bshad nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dbu ma'i man ngag khyad 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
tshogs chos bden bzhi gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
yi dam rgyud sde bzhi'i bskang ba bde stong ye shes rol ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal ldan rgyud sde bzhi'i bskang ba nye bar bsdus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rgyud sde bzhi'i bskang ba nyung ngu don gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi gtor bskang rnam dag rol ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bskang ba byang chub lam 'dren zhes bya ba bzhugs sgo/ //
dpal ye shes kyi mgon po mahā kā la phyag drug pa 'khor bcas kyi gtor bskang bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bsang mchod dgos 'dod kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bram ze sku sha'am skye bdun ril bu sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi mdun du smon lam btab pa bzhugs/
Volume 3, ༼ག༽
nges don mthar thug de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
lta ba ngan sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i dbu ma chos dbyings bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
Volume 4, ༼ང༽
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum rdzogs ldan lugs kyi bshad pa khyad 'phags bzhugs so/ /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 5, ༼ཅ༽
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa'i mchan bu zur du bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / /
nyi khri le mang dang le brgyad pa'i mi 'dra ba'i khyad par che long so drug go /
nyi khri le mang dang le brgyad pa'i khyad par gtan la phab pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal yongs grub dgu'i bshad pa khyad 'phags g.yu rnying lta bu bzhugs so/ /
'bum dus 'khor rdzogs ldan lugs su 'chad skabs kyi rnam thar bzhugs so/ /
rang bzhin gsum gyi rnam gzhag bzhugs so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa mdo lugs ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 6, ༼ཆ༽
sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la shes nas dad pa thob par byed pa'i thabs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
chos kyi sgo chen mang du 'byed pa'i thabs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bka' bsdu bzhi pa'i don bstan rtsis chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bka' bsdu bzhi pa'i don bstan rtsis chen po'i 'grel pa phyogs med ris med ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bka' mdo rgyud zab mo kun gyi spyi 'grel gcig shes kun grol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
slob ma rnams la spring ba skur 'debs dang sgro 'dogs spang ba bzhugs so/ /
gsung rab spyi'i dkar chag bzhugs/
kun gzhi'i rab tu dbye ba khyad par du 'phags pa bzhugs so//
stong nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba khyad 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
srid mi srid kyi dbye ba khyad 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rang rig rang gsal gyi rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
chos sku lhun grub rgyal po'i 'ja' sa bzhugs/
bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba'i 'ja' sa bzhugs/
shags 'byed bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
dpon byang pa'i phyag tu phul ba'i chos kyi shan 'byed bzhugs so/ /
so so skye bo'i paṇḍi ta la sogs pa rnams kyi 'khrul ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bka' yang dag kun gyi gnad nas bzung ba bzhugs so/ /
don zab dgongs 'grel bzhugs/
lung don gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
chos dbyings du ma ro gcig ces bya ba bde gshegs snying po yon tan can gyi me long bzhugs/
sha chang bkag pa'i lung 'dren rnams bzhugs so/ /
mchod rten chags tshad bzhugs/
lta ba shan 'byed yid kyi mun sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bden gnyis gsal ba'i nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 7, ༼ཇ༽
'grel chen dri med 'od kyi tshigs bcad dang po'i ṭī ka bzhugs so/ /
byed pa'i rtsis kyi mtshan nyid bzhugs/
yan lag lnga'i rtsis dang gza' lnga'i rtsis bzhugs/
sgra gcan rtsis dang gza' 'dzin rtsis bzhugs/
rtsis kyi rgyu mtshan bzhugs/
mjug ring gi rtsis bzhugs/
gza' bcu stong par 'jug tshul bzhugs/dus bzhi chen po'i rtsis/
rnal 'byor pa'i 'chi ltas brtag pa rtsa 'grel bzhugs/
bden pa gnyis kyi tshon gyis gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mngal du yi ge 'phel tshul bzhugs/
dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ye shes kyi le'u'i rgyud kyi nges don zab mo rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa bzhugs so//
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i thugs dkyil rgyas pa'i mngon rtogs bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i thugs dkyil bsdus pa'i mngon rtogs bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lha dgu'i mngon rtogs cung zad bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lhan cig skyes pa'i mngon rtogs rgyas pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dag pa'i rim pa'i lag len mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dbang gi cho ga ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'dab chags mgon po'i sgrub thabs las tshogs gzhan phan dang bcas pa bzhugs/
dus 'khor lhan skyes mngon rtogs bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig pa'i mngon rtogs bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bskyed rim gyi cho ga bzhugs so/ /
sbyin sreg gi cho ga nang gi mun sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs so/ /
zhi rgyas las rkyang gi sbyin sreg bzhugs so/ /
zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg bzhi'i spyi chings nor bu chu dwangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
ye shes me la mchod pa 'bul ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab tshul bzhugs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis dge legs rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bstod pa'am mngon rtogs nye bar bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i yongs rdzogs kyi mngon rtogs dang bstod pa zung 'jug gi 'grel pa bzhugs so/ /
sngags klag thabs bzhugs so/ /
Volume 8, ༼ཉ༽
dbang mdor bstan pa'i 'grel pa don dam bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i bsdus don bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje gar gyi brjed byang mdor bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
dgyes rdor dbang gi legs bshad lung dang mthun pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje phreng ba'i thig rtsa man ngag gis brgyan pa bzhugs so/ /
'khor lo som pa'i rtsa sngags rgyud nas btus pa'o/ /
dbang gi cho ga rnam par bsdus pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba bzhugs so/ /
mkhas btsun yon tan rgya mtsho'i rnam thar dngos grub 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
yan lag drug gi thun mong ma yin pa bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs ma bzhugs so/ /
rtsa ba'i bla ma'i gsol 'debs dngos grub 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma'i bka' drin dran pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
dge legs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
bla ma'i gsol 'debs rigs ldan bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
bla ma yi dam dbyer med la gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
kun spangs chen po chos rje yab sras rnams la gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
zab lam nye rgyud kyi gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
bla ma bka' rgyud ring ba la gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
kun spangs chos rje la gsol 'debs kun tu bzang po bzhugs so/ /
kun spangs chen po la gsol 'debs ngan 'gro'i 'jigs sel bzhugs so/ /
chos rje byang sems chen po la bstod pa dngos grub 'byung gnas bzhugs so/ /
byang sems chen po'i bstod pa dgos 'dod 'byung gnas bzhugs so/ /
mkhas btsun yon tan rgya mtsho la bstod pa byin rlabs rgya mtsho bzhugs so/ /
mkhas btsun yon tan rgya mtsho'i bstod pa dbang bskur rgya mtsho bzhugs so/ /
sbyor drug ngos 'dzin gyi gsol 'debs bde stong gsal byed bzhugs so/ /
bde gshegs snying po'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
chos 'khor ma zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
mtshungs med ma zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
snying po rab gsal zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
mtha' bral chen mo zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
rdzogs ldan gyi gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje tshig gi mdud grol chen mo zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
bstan pa spyi 'grel zhes bya ba'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
sku bzhi'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so//
drug drug so drug gi gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
rgyal ba rigs drug gi gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
phyogs dus kun khyab ma bzhugs so/ /
bla ma'i gsol 'debs khyad 'phags bzhugs so/ /
nges don mthar thug gi gsol 'debs bzhugs so/ /
smon lam khyad 'phags rgyas pa bzhugs so/ /
smon lam khyad 'phags bsdus pa bzhugs so//
smon lam khyad 'phags gnyis pa bzhugs so//
nges don mthar thug gi smon lam bzhugs so//
'pho ba'i man ngag khyad 'phags rab tu rgyas pa bzhugs so//
'pho ba'i man ngag bsdus pa bzhugs so//
ngo sprod khyad 'phags bzhugs so//
shes rab bla ma'i zhus lan bzhugs so//
rnal 'byor pa dad pa seng ge la gdams pa bzhugs so//
nye gnas sangs rin la gdams pa bzhugs so//
nye gnas nam mkha' byang chub la gdams pa bzhugs so/ /
zab lam bsgom pa'i bu slob rnams la gdams pa bzhugs so/ /
ston pa grub bzang la gdams pa bzhugs so/ /
dus 'khor ba rdo rje snying po la gdams pa bzhugs so/ /
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho byang chub la gdams pa'o/ /
nyi 'od la gdams pa bzhugs/
lha rje tshul khrims 'od la gdams pa'o/ /
gzhon nu don grub la gdams pa bzhugs so//
bla ma jo mdo pa grags pa rgyal mtshan la gdams pa'i springs yig bde chen 'od gsal ba bzhugs so//
rgya yul ba'i bla ma dkon mchog rgyal mtshan la gdams pa bzhugs so/ /
bla ma dkon mchog rgyal mtshan pa'i gcung po rdo rje dpal la bskur ba'i spring yig ma rig mun sel/
chos rje rin po ches bla ma rdo rje dpal ba la gang du bskur ba'i spring yig
zhu yig 'bul ba bzhugs/
chos rje rin po ches dpon mo dhārma shrī la gong du bskur ba/
yar 'brog pa dpon mo khye 'dren mgon la 'chi khar gdams pa bzhugs so/ /
jo bo ri pa bla ma dkon mchog mgon gyi zhus lan bzhugs so/ /
bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos chos rje'i drung du phul ba bzhugs so/ /
chos rje nyid kyis bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan pa la phul ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan pas chos rje'i drung du phul ba bzhugs so/ /
chos rje nyid kyis bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan pa'i drung du phul ba bzhugs so/ /
don yod pas chos rje la phul ba bzhugs so/ /
g.yag sde paṇ chen gyis dris lan bzhugs so//
bsam sdings cog pu pa'i zhus lan bzhugs so/ /
lo tsā ba shes rab rin chen gyi zhus lan bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun gu ru rin po che la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa dge legs 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa rten dang brten par bcas pa'i bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
phyag rdor gyi bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa'o/ /
'jam dbyangs gsung gi lha tshogs la bstod pa'o/ /
'jam dbyangs lha khang gi lha tshogs la bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ba spu nyag gcig la bstod pa nges don rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags pa bhu khang pa la bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
'khor lo sdom chung gi bstod pa'o/ /
srung ma drug cu'i bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpal yon can gyi bzhengs tshul la bstod pa 'khor ba dong sprug ces bya ba bzhugs so//
mchod rten chen po dpal yon can la bstod pa byin rlabs kyi gter chen zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gnas lugs zab mo stong pa nyid la bstod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
shin tu rnal 'byor la bstod pa tshogs gnyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bde gshegs snying po'i bstod pa dad gus gter chen zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
zhing mchog sham bha la'i bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
sham bha la'i bstod pa chung ba bzhugs so/ /
sham bha la'i zhing bkod kyi bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
rgyal sras lag len bzhugs so/ /
rang gzhan chos la bskul ba bzhugs so/ /
bar skabs su thor bu brjod pa bzhugs so/ /
lhag bsam bskul ba'i mdo'i lung btus bzhugs so/ /
rang gzhan bde ba can du skye ba'i thabs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bde ba can gyi smon lam bzhugs so/ /
bde ba can gyi smon lam bzhugs so/ /
gal po che'i smon lam bzhugs so/ /
yig drug bka' ma bzhugs so/ /
yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /
ma ṇi nges don bzhugs so/ /
spyan ras gzigs kyi gzungs 'dus bzhugs so/ /
dus mchod bzhi ngos bzung ba bzhugs/
thun mong ma yin pa'i gtor ma bzhugs/
thun mong ma yin pa'i chos spyod bzhugs/
slob ma la spring ba nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rim gnyis kyi smon lam bzhugs so/ /
bde gshegs snying po'i bkra shis bzhugs so/ /
lo gsar pa bkra shis par byed pa'i thabs dang po bzhugs so/ /
lo gsar pa bkra shis par byed pa'i thabs gnyis pa bzhugs so/ /
pra dbab pa bzhugs so/ /
'dren mchog bla ma bde bar gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dus kyi khyad par dran byed/
zhang ston pas mdzad pa'i ngo sprod bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen dol po pa'i rnam thar rgyas pa las slar yang bsdus pa lha'i rgyal mtshan gyis bkod pa'i dbu phyogs lags so/ /
chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du bsgom thabs bde stong ye shes rol ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la gsol ba btab na tshig 'dis gsol ba btab par bya/
chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nges don dang sbyor drug gi bka' babs rgyal sras rin tshul bas mdzad pa'i tshogs gnyis lam 'jug gsal ba'i sgron me bzhugs so/ /
chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstod pa de nyid kyi slob ma thang chen kun dga' 'bum gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /
chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa la bstod pa nor bu'i 'phreng ba blo gros dpal gyis mdzad pa'o/ /
chos kyi rje thams cad pa la bstod pa ngo mtshar rtogs brjod ces bya ba bha brom pas mdzad pa'o/ /
Volume 9, ༼ཏ༽
theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos kyi rnam par bshad pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal ldan dus 'khor rgyud 'grel gyi bsdus don yongs 'du lta bu bzhugs/
dus 'khor gyi lha 'dabs 'ga' bzhugs so/ /
kun gzhi'i rab tu dbye ba khyad 'phags bzhugs/
stong nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba bzhugs/
don dam dbyings rig dbyer med la bstod pa bzhugs/
dpal phyag rgya chen po la bstod cing phyag 'tshal ba rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs/
mdo rgyud zab mo kun gyi spyi 'grel zhes bya ba bzhugs/
slob dpon mtshur bu blo gros seng ge'i dris lan bzhugs/
gsol 'debs kyi rgyal po bzhugs/
spang blang gi chos ngos bzung ba sogs bzhugs/
sku 'bum chen po grub dus btab pa'i smon lam bzhugs/
lo gsar pa bkra shis par byed pa'i thabs gsum pa bzhugs/
